arts.ttl: Frank Schmidt: “It was our most important game”
arts.sum: Heidenheim’s coach Frank Schmidt is satisfied with his side’s big win over Holstein Kiel.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim's spirits lifted following huge win vs Kiel
arts.sum: Heidenheim produced a huge 3-1 win against Kiel following two first-half goals from new signing Budu Zivizadze and Marvin Pieringer.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim triumph in relegation six-pointer against Kiel
arts.sum: Goals from Marvin Pieringer, Budu Zivzivadze, and Sirlord Conteh sealed the win despite a late Kiel fightback. The Voith-Arena played host to a crucial relegation battle as Heidenheim welcomed Holstein Kiel for a match that could significantly impact both teams' Bundesliga survival hopes.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs. Holstein Kiel preview: A relegation six-pointer
arts.sum: The bottom two teams in the Bundesliga will face off when Heidenheim welcome Holstein Kiel to the Voith-Arena on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Heidenheim vs. Holstein Kiel - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Heidenheim and Holstein Kiel, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
